text.name: system_description
text.text: The Othello Multivision is a console released in 1983 by Tsukuda Original, compatible with SEGA's SG-1000 games. It features an integrated wired controller and was designed around the game Othello. A few exclusive games were developed, but the console remained little-known. It's a clone of the SG-1000, offering an unpopular alternative to SEGA's machine.
